name: mountain trail hooded cowl
sizes_available: adult: approximately 12” wide x 21” height before folding
notes:
stay effortlessly warm and stylish this winter with the mountain trail hooded cowl – a modern, oversized hooded ribbed cowl that’s as practical as it is beautiful.

this clever one-piece design is crocheted from the bottom up, combining a generous cowl with a deep, cozy hood for when the wind picks up. the standout woven-look stitch creates a rich texture that looks intricately woven yet is surprisingly simple to master, giving your finished piece a luxurious feel.

the magic is in the unique woven-look stitch that creates a dense, textured fabric reminiscent of hand-woven baskets or rustic cabin blankets, yet it’s surprisingly simple once you get into the rhythm. paired with bulky yarn, the stitch pops beautifully and gives the cowl that coveted chunky, luxurious feel that keeps the wind out and the compliments coming.

worked in bulky yarn, this pattern is a true quick-make – making it ideal for last-minute gifts or instant gratification projects.
